extensionDescription.message: A powerful clipboard extension for Chrome.

searchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the search box

tagSearchPlaceholder.description: Placeholder text for the tag search box

addTagButtonTitle.description: Title for the add tag button

enterTagPrompt.description: Prompt text for entering a new tag

deleteItemConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
deleteItemConfirm.description: Confirmation message for deleting a clipboard item

importConfirmMessage.message: Import data? This will overwrite all current data.

importFailedMessage.description: Error message when importing data fails

importFileReadErrorMessage.message: Failed to read file. Please check file format.
importFileReadErrorMessage.description: Error message when the imported file cannot be read

formPanelButtonTitle.description: Title for the form panel button

backToMainButtonTitle.description: Title for the back to main button

mapFormButtonTitle.description: Title for the map form button

formManagementTitle.description: Title for the form management section

extractFormButtonTitle.description: Title for the extract form button

savedFormsTabTitle.description: Title for the saved forms tab

clearSearchTitle.description: Title for the clear search button

mapFormTitle.description: Title for the map form field modal

formFieldNameLabel.description: Label for the field name input

formMappingNameLabel.description: Label for the mapping name input

formMappingNamePlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the mapping name input

formMappingColumnLabel.description: Label for the mapping column input

formMappingColumnPlaceholder.description: Placeholder for the mapping column input

extractFormInitialText.message: Click the button below to extract forms from the current page.
extractFormInitialText.description: Text shown in the initial extract form view

extractPageFormsButton.description: Text for the extract page forms button

noFormsFoundText.message: No forms were found on this page.
noFormsFoundText.description: Text shown when no forms are found

extractFormErrorText.description: Text shown when there is an error extracting forms

noSavedFormsFoundText.description: Text shown when no saved forms are found

saveFormsSuccessAlert.description: Alert after successfully saving form data.

noFieldsSelectedAlert.message: No fields were selected to save.
noFieldsSelectedAlert.description: Alert when user tries to save a form with no fields checked.

unnamedFieldLabel.description: Label for a form field without a name.

fieldNameDetailLabel.description: Label for field name in details

deleteFormConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this saved form?
deleteFormConfirm.description: Confirmation for deleting a saved form.

noMappingFieldDataAlert.description: Alert when saving mapping with no data.

mappingInputErrorAlert.message: Please provide both a mapping name and a column value.

contextMenuAddToSuperClipboard.description: Title for the context menu item when selecting text.

errorInjectScriptFailed.description: Error message when content script injection fails.

errorConnectionFailedAfterInject.description: Error message when connection still fails after injection.

errorNoActiveTab.description: Error message when no active tab is found to send a message to.

errorItemNotFound.description: Error when trying to update or delete a non-existent clipboard item.

errorFormNotFound.description: Error when trying to update or delete a non-existent saved form.
